content.description: Sit start match , left into crimp rail, then right cross over to a top out left heel up.
content.location: Can't miss the crimp rail mid route

content.description: Begin   in the crack between “Slasher Boulder” and “ Vendetta Boulder”, then proceed   straight up. Great day-starter boulder.
content.location: Locate   the crack between “Slasher Boulder” and “ Vendetta Boulder”.

content.description: Sit start match.  Tall beta can go straight up right hand, or you can use the crimp rail left to assist. Top out right heel. Good beginner top out.

Begin   above the furthest-left finger crack on vendetta boulder then traverse the   entire lip till you begin to really feel the burn or pass the prominent horn   into the dish section at the end. Promptly top-out before your arms give out.   Great route for toe-hooks and heel-hooks.
content.location: Begin with sit start on the furthest-left finger crack on   vendetta boulder.

content.description: Begin at the start holds of “Angry Albatross” then fall   right to the half/full pad rail (generally very caked in chalk), re-adjust   feet, then blast to the rightward dish-lip and finish it.
content.location: Start   on the relatively good right under-cling and almost existent two-finger crimp   and proceed to the right.

content.description: Begin with sit start on the furthest-left finger crack on   vendetta boulder, explode to the lip, then traverse the entire lip till you   begin to really feel the burn or pass the prominent horn into the dish section   at the end. Promptly top-out before your arms give out. Great route for   toe-hooks and heel-hooks.
content.location: Begin   with sit start on the furthest-left finger crack on vendetta boulder.

content.description: Begin   with the sloppy under-cling in the dead-middle of Vendetta boulder and squeeze   for dear life to keep from falling back on the pad, then blast to the lip and   top-out. Short but powerful boulder, great intro to topping out outside.
content.location: Start   on the relatively good right under-cling and almost existent two-finger crimp   and proceed straight up to lip.

content.description: Secluded bouldering area with high quality granite problems.
